Name: Find The Balance
About the game: One of the best physics based puzzle games in the store! Stack objects and make it steady! Stones, boxes, bananas - whatever you can imagine. Place all the stuff to make a steady tower and have fun finding the balance. Think over, select and rotate elements, cut the line and drop objects gently. Find the Balance is a puzzle like game joining an art of stone stacking with easy but challenging gameplay. One of the best physics games you've ever played that you can enjoy with a friend! Features: - 100+ levels - 4 single player game modes (classic, stars, endless, autofall single) - 3 multiplayer game modes (adding blocks, speed stack, autofall multi) - 35+ cutting items to unlock - many different soundracks to listen to - unlimited fun placing physical objects - great physics and balancing challenge
